Mark Stewart Cohen
Cohen & Gresser, LLP (NYC)
800 Third Avenue
New York, NY 10022
(212) 957-7600
Fax: (212)957-4514
Email: mcohen@cohengresser.com
LEAD ATTORNEY
ATTORNEY TO BE NOTICED
Bobbi C Sternheim
Bobbi C. Sternheim, Esq.
225 Broadway
Suite 715
New York, NY 10007
212-243-1100
Fax: 888-587-4737
Email: bcsternheim@mac.com
ATTORNEY TO BE NOTICED
Designation: Retained
Pending Counts
18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO ENTICE MINORS TO TRAVEL TO ENGAGE IN ILLEGAL SEX ACTS (1ss)
18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO TRANSPORT MINORS WITH INTENT TO ENGAGE IN CRIMINAL SEXUAL ACTIVITY (3ss)
18:2423.F COERCION OR ENTICEMENT OF MINOR FEMALE (TRANSPORTATION OF A MINOR WITH INTENT TO ENGAGE IN CRIMINAL SEXUAL ACTIVITY) (4ss)
18:371.F SEX TRAFFICKING CONSPIRACY (5ss)
18:1591.F SEX TRAFFICKING OF CHILDREN OR BY FORCE, FRAUD OR COERCION (6ss)
Highest Offense Level (Opening)
Felony
Terminated Counts
18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO ENTICE MINORS TO TRAVEL TO ENGAGE IN ILLEGAL SEX ACTS
Disposition
Judgment not entered on 1 & 5 as multiplicitous, Dkt. No. 657.
IMPRISONMENT: The Defendant is sentenced to a term of 240 Months. Count 3 a sentence of 60 Months. Count 4 a sentence of 120 Months. Count 6 a sentence of 240 Months. All Counts to run concurrently. SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 Years on Counts 3 and 4. 5 Years on Count 6 to run concurrently. FINE: $750,000.00
Disposition
Dismissed
DOJ-OGR-00020490

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court document related to a case involving sex trafficking and related charges. The defendant has been sentenced to imprisonment and fined. The document includes details about the charges, the disposition of the case, and the attorneys involved.
